short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun Chrome extension that shoots a poo image across the screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upset at something you read on the web? Need to release some stress? Do so with this fun Chrome extension where you'll 'fling' the poo emoji across your screen!! Unlike real poo though, you don't have to smell it, and it cleans up itself from your screen within seconds!! Click it as many times as you need to show your disapproval about what's on your screen. Or just click it to have fun and relieve some stress!
